import { Film } from '../../types/films'; type FilmDetailsProps = { film: Film; } function FilmDetails({film}: FilmDetailsProps): JSX.Element { return (

Director {film?.director}

Starring

Run Time 1h 39m

Genre Comedy

Released 2014

); } export default FilmDetails;
